SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM POSTTB WHERE 1=1
AND POST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gllyNm},'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT PT.POST_NO AS GLLY_NO , PT.POST_NM AS GLLY_NM , PT.POST_CTS AS GLLY_CTS , PT.IMG_PSTN , PT.MAIN_COMMENT , PT.SUB_COMMENT , DATE_FORMAT(PT.REGI_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS REGI_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(PT.MODY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as MODY_DATE , PT.MODY_DATE AS SORT_MODY_DATE , PT.FILE_TYPE , FT.FILE_NO , FT.FILE_SEQ , FT.FILE_PATH , FT.FILE_NM_KEY FROM POSTTB PT LEFT OUTER JOIN FILETB FT ON CONCAT(PT.POST_DIST, LPAD(PT.POST_NO ,5,'0')) = FT.FILE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND PT.POST_DIST = 'GLLY' AND PT.FILE_TYPE = #{fileType} AND FT.FILE_SEQ = '1'
AND PT.POST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gllyNm},'%')
AND PT.POST_CTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{gllyCts},'%')
ORDER BY SORT_MODY_DATE DESC ) T1 ORDER BY SORT_MODY_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start},${cntPerPage}

SELECT PT.POST_NO AS GLLY_NO , PT.FILE_TYPE , FT.FILE_NO , FT.FILE_SEQ , FT.FILE_NM_KEY , FT.FILE_PATH , FT.FILE_SIZE , FT.REGI_DATE FROM POSTTB PT , FILETB FT WHERE PT.POST_NO = #{gllyNo} AND FT.FILE_NO = CONCAT('GLLY',LPAD(PT.POST_NO,5,'0'))
SELECT NVL(MAX(POST_NO),0) + 1 AS GLLY_NO FROM POSTTB WHERE POST_DIST = 'GLLY'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILETB ( FILE_NO , FILE_SEQ , FILE_NM_KEY , FILE_PATH , FILE_SIZE , REGI_DATE) VALUES ( CONCAT('GLLY',LPAD(#{gllyNo},5,'0')) , #{fileSeq} , #{fileNameKey} , #{filePath} , #{fileSize} , SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT PT.POST_NO AS GLLY_NO , PT.POST_NM AS GLLY_NM , PT.POST_CTS AS GLLY_CTS , PT.IMG_PSTN , PT.MAIN_COMMENT , PT.SUB_COMMENT , PT.FILE_TYPE , DATE_FORMAT(PT.REGI_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS REGI_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(PT.MODY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as MODY_DATE , PT.MODY_DATE AS SORT_MODY_DATE , FT.FILE_NO , FT.FILE_SEQ , FT.FILE_PATH , FT.FILE_NM_KEY FROM POSTTB PT LEFT OUTER JOIN FILETB FT ON CONCAT(PT.POST_DIST, LPAD(PT.POST_NO ,5,'0')) = FT.FILE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND PT.POST_DIST = 'GLLY' AND PT.POST_NO = #{gllyNo} AND FT.FILE_SEQ = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FILETB WHERE FILE_NO = CONCAT('GLLY',LPAD(#{gllyNo},5,'0'))
